Reviews.Content: surprised we were honestly not expecting much from this place but were simply blown away by the simplicity and style of their design,the excellent food,and more than friendly service......initially we did flinch on not seeing tv's in the room but it proved to be a big boon...definitely a place worth going to..lots of things to do around....
Reviews.Author: sabad

Reviews.Content: Great location Great peaceful spot. Nice beach and very good food. returning again soon.
Reviews.Author: Kiwi2NZ
